name: Cowgeddon
description:
Cowgeddon - adorable adventure of hungry cow. Simple controls and fun puzzles make the game accessible to everyone.

Your main goal in the game is to collect all the food on the level and feed the cow. But remember - each level is fraught with danger!

Features:

- Cute and bright pixel art;

- Restful and pleasant music;

- Many interesting levels with different puzzles.
